Text: Isn't this a 7-issue series, not five?

yes and no. comixology calls this #5 of 7, but the final 2 issues are re-titled, locke & key: alpha #1-2.

also, no issue in july. alpha #1 comes out in august.
The original plan was for 7. However at c2e2 they announced a change of plans.  They reduced this series to 5, and announced Alpha.  Two double sized final issues.
